title: Ep. 177: What is Luxury for You?
description:
Do the “ten minute closer” to help yourself make orderly transitions, what’s
luxury for you, and how to deal with demanding neighbors—plus the mystery of
shoe size!
Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin; happiercast.com/177; 774-
277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
